text:
- I'm Niki Luhur, Founder
and Group CEO at VIDA.

VIDA was founded in 2018
with a clear mission:

to make it easy for people
to prove who they are.

VIDA has rapidly grown its
footprint across Indonesia,

Singapore, India, and Malaysia
with over 150 professionals.

We provide cutting-edge solutions
for identity verification,
for digital financial services,

healthcare, e-commerce,
travel, and the gig economy.
Our impact extends globally.
VIDA's digital signatures

are recognized in more than
40 countries around the world.
Currently, our team manages
over 1.8 million face authentications
and libraries checks a day,

showcasing our commitment
to delivering secure

and seamless identity
verifications at scale.

However, oftentimes, having
robust security measures

comes at a cost of a
lengthy verification process
and high drop operates.
What makes VIDA unique

is that we leverage our
expertise in security
to drive a seamless user experience
and ensure there's strong legal assurance.
We built a robust identity stack

and a state-of-the-art
face liveness detection
to achieve this.

Liveness detection is a key
part of identity proofing,

allowing us to confirm that
a user is a live person,
not a mask, a screen, or deepfake.

VIDA's liveness solutions
have been on the cloud day one
'cause we knew it's critical
to have the right infrastructure
that can optimize our product evolution.
We needed an easy way

to train and deploy
computer vision models,

as well as a secure and
scalable infrastructure.
AWS was the clear choice for VIDA.

We use Amazon SageMaker to
train all of our models.
We trained our models with images
that consist of labeled production data
and synthetic lab data generated in-house
to simulate different attack vectors.

After experimenting with
different deep learning models,
we determined the right network of models
to protect our customers.
By optimizing the training

and deployment process using
Amazon SageMaker and Terraform,

we're now able to make up
to 15 deployments a month

and manage a network
of more than 10 models
running concurrently.
With Amazon SageMaker,

we could easily update
and trade our models
to handle new fraud attacks
and adapt to our customers' needs.
We've been able to automate up to 98%

of our clients' account
onboarding with VIDA.

AWS give us the agility to
rapidly improve our AI models,
and we're able to more effectively address

and protect our customers
evolving for our concerns,

while ensuring we meet our
customers' core growth agendas.

Our vision at VIDA is to
enable the world of trust

where digital identities
are seamlessly verified.
As we continue our journey,

we foresee leveraging
additional AWS solutions
to enhance our capabilities further.

AWS has been instrumental in
propelling our mission forward,

and we're eager to explore
new innovations and services
that align with our commitment
to providing secure, accessible,

and user-friendly digital
identity solutions.

Our vision is to enable
the world of trust.
The future is verified.
(uplifting music)
